kw.name: abrir aplicativo
kw.doc: abre o aplicativo mobile

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

test.name: Cenario 01: validar que é aberto a tela de cadastrar alarmes

kw.name: Dado que estou na aba de "Alarm"
Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.arg: não foi possível encontrar o elemento ${elemento}
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.
